title: Oxygen
subtitle: /Oxyg√®ne
review: A very familiar situation where you're talking in circles with a conversational AI model that is always affirmative, but unaware of its own inconsistent responses. The best part of was during a certain rotating camera shot, but that happens a so much it's hard to narrow down. It's panning around an axis parallel with Liz's body, so you see her face and the AI animation, passing through the frame in time with their conversation.
